content: The backyard is actually one of the features that drew us to the house. It's a good size, with a big patio area perfect for outdoor dining or entertaining. The previous owners had already done some landscaping, so there are some nice plants and trees around the yard. We're thinking of adding a garden bed or two to grow some herbs and veggies, and maybe even install a fire pit for cozy nights outdoors. Nothing too major, just some tweaks to make it our own.
